    Memberships

    Membership Pay You Get Details
    Basic Membership ฿1750 Access to ฿2000 worth of classes Pay less up-front and use on any class (valid 6 forever)
    Pro Membership ฿3500 Access to ฿4000 worth of classes Best value – works out to around 10 classes (valid 8 forever)

    Private Session

    Tailor-made 60-minute class – starts at ฿1500 (price varies by group size and location).

    Memberships are non-transferable and activate on your first visit.
